{"id":968532020,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1686453025,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/968532020/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Collecting Chocolates","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long minCost(int[] nums, int x) {\n        int n=nums.length;\n        long[] cost=new long[nums.length];\n        int[] ops=new int[nums.length];\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){\n            int min=nums[i];\n            int shifts=1;\n            int op=0;\n            int idx=(i+1)%n;\n            while(idx!=i){\n                if(nums[idx]+x*shifts<min){\n                    op=shifts;\n                    min=nums[idx]+x*shifts;\n                }\n                idx=(idx+1)%n;\n                shifts++;\n                \n            }\n            cost[i]=min;\n            ops[i]=op;\n        }\n        int ans=0;\n        int curr=0;\n         // System.out.println(Arrays.toString(cost));\n         // System.out.println(Arrays.toString(ops));\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            System.out.println(curr);\n            ans+=cost[i];\n            if(curr>ops[i]){\n                ans=ans-ops[i]*x;\n                \n            }\n            else if(curr<ops[i] ){\n                if(curr==0){\n                    curr=ops[i];\n                    continue;\n                }\n                ans=ans-(ops[i]-curr)*x;\n                curr=ops[i];\n                \n            }\n            \n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"collecting-chocolates","has_notes":false}
